Package com.company.utilities

Class DoublyLinkedList

java.lang.Object
com.company.utilities.DoublyLinkedList
Direct Known Subclasses:
Queue
public class DoublyLinkedList extends Object
My own implementation of a doubly linked list.

  • Constructor Details

    • DoublyLinkedList

      public DoublyLinkedList()
      Initializes an empty doubly linked list with sentinel nodes as the head and tail.

  • Method Details

    • insertFront

      public void insertFront(Node node)
      Inserts a node at the front of the doubly linked list
      Parameters:
      node - Node to be inserted

    • insertBack

      public void insertBack(Node node)
      Inserts a node at the fact of the doubly linked list.
      Parameters:
      node - Node to be inserted

    • removeFront

      public void removeFront()
      Removes a node from the front of the doubly linked list. Returns if the size of the linked list is 0.

    • removeBack

      public void removeBack()
      Removes a node from the back of the doubly linked list. Returns if the size of the linked list is 0.

    • remove

      public void remove(long id)
      Removes a specified value from the doubly linked list. Precondition is that all values in the linked list are unique.
      Parameters:
      id - Value to be removed

    • get

      public Node get(int idx)
      Returns the value of a specified index in the doubly linked list.
      Parameters:
      idx - The index
      Returns:
      The node at index idx

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Returns the size of the doubly linked list.
      Returns:
      Size of the doubly linked list

    • fromJSONArray

      public void fromJSONArray(org.json.simple.JSONArray arr)
      Initializes the doubly linked list with values from a JSONArray.
      Parameters:
      arr - The JSONArray to be read from

    • toJSONArray

      public org.json.simple.JSONArray toJSONArray()
      Convertes the doubly linked list to a JSONArray.
      Returns:
      The converted JSONArray
